meanings.definition: A person or device that creates visual representations or images.
meanings.sent1: The visualizer displayed colorful graphs on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a visualizer to project their drawings during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The visualizer at the concert made the music come alive with vibrant lights.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination acted like a visualizer, turning words into vivid scenes in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The visualizer painted a clear picture of the data through the charts and diagrams.

meanings.definition: To create a mental image or picture.
meanings.sent1: She tried to visualizer the beach scene in her mind.
meanings.sent2: When reading the book, he would often visualizer the characters and settings.
meanings.sent3: He visualized himself as a superhero flying through the city.
meanings.sent4: The idea of success can be hard to visualize, but with determination, it becomes clearer.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing the finish line helped him push through the last stretch of the race.
